name: RadioHead
keywords: radio, wireless, lora, rf22, rf24, rf26, rf27, rf69, si4460, si4461, si4463, si4464, nrf24, nrf905, sx1276, sx77, sx78, rfm95, rfm96, rfm97, rfm98
description: Packet Radio library for embedded microprocessors. Provides a complete object-oriented library for sending and receiving packetized messages via a variety of common data radios and other transports on a range of embedded microprocessors.
